Package bg.tu_varna.sit.group17.database

Class Add

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.sit.group17.database.Add
public final class Add extends Object
This class is used for adding records to the database.

  • Method Details

    • companyPrice

      public static void companyPrice(String companyName, double plik, double kolet, double paket, double tovar) throws SQLException
      Adds prices for company's package types.
      Parameters:
      companyName - the name of the company.
      plik - the price for an envelope.
      kolet - - the price for a package.
      paket - - the price for a big package.
      tovar - - the price for a cargo.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a problem with the database occurs.

    • customer

      public static void customer(String name, String phone, int city, String address, String password) throws SQLException
      Adds new customer to the database.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the customer.
      phone - the customer's phone number.
      city - - the customer's current city.
      address - - the customer's current addres.
      password - the password for customer's account.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a problem with the database occurs.

    • office

      public static void office(int id_company, int id_city, String address) throws SQLException
      Adds new company office to the database.
      Parameters:
      id_company - id number of the company in which the office to be added.
      id_city - id number of the city in which the office is placed.
      address - the new office's addres.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a problem with the database occurs.

    • courier

      public static void courier(String name, String phone, String password, int id_office) throws SQLException
      Adds new courier to the database.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the courier.
      phone - phone number of the courier.
      password - password for courier's account.
      id_office - id number of the courier's working office.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a problem with the database occurs.

    • order

      public static void order(int id_category, int id_office_sender, int id_office_recipient, int id_customer_sender, int id_customer_recipient, int id_courier, int id_status, boolean fragile, boolean paid, double cash_on_delivery, boolean delivery_to_address, String address, Date acceptance_by_sender, Date customer_delivery) throws SQLException
      Adds new order to the database.
      Parameters:
      id_category - id number of the order's type package.
      id_office_sender - id number of the order's sender office.
      id_office_recipient - id number of the order's recipient office.
      id_customer_sender - id number of the order's customer sender.
      id_customer_recipient - id number of the orders's customer recipient.
      id_courier - id number of the courider making the order.
      id_status - id number of the current order status.
      fragile - inidicates if the package contains fragile items.
      paid - indicates if the order is paid by the customer sender.
      cash_on_delivery - indicates if the order if the customer recipient will pay for the delivery.
      delivery_to_address - indicates if the order is going to be delivered to specific addres.
      address - specific addres to which the order is going ot be delivered.
      acceptance_by_sender - the date of making the order.
      customer_delivery - the date of order's delivery.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a problem with the database occurs.
